name: Crucis Mortem - Mario Horror Game (Demo)
description:
Crucis Mortem is a Creepypasta Horror Game based on the NES classic Super Mario Bros 2 (USA).

Now any place is safe for you, not even your own machine, Embark on the horrors that lie ahead, sealed in a rom file. Jump from platform to platform, Survive and hurry up to escape this nightmare in this game focused on gameplay and story combined with horror elements. Can you survive this nightmare that you caused?

Be aware that this game is just in a demo phase, there are thing that will change or improved.

All characters are owned by NINTENDO. This is just a non-profit fan-game.

CONTROLS:

S = Jump Button

A = Action Button

Arrow Keys = Move

R = Restart Game

Hold Down Key = Super Jump
